items.title: Save space on your nightstand or desk with Anker’s MagGo Nano 3-in-1 15W Qi2 charging station at $76 (Reg. $90)
items.summary:
Through its official Amazon storefront, Anker is offering its MagGo Nano 3-in-1 15W Qi2 Charging Station at $76.49 shipped, after clipping the on-page coupon. With that coupon the price is coming off its full $90 rate to roughly the same price that has been frequent since October’s Prime Day ended. While we have seen it go as low as $63 (last seen in September 2025), you’re still looking at a solid 15% markdown that cuts $14 off the tag for the best price we have tracked in the last three to four months.

That makes this the lowest price we’ve ever tracked for this 32-inch Odyssey model, and you can learn more about it in detail below.
